title: Scorn of the Moon
body: I love Diana's concept so I felt like drawing her today !

replies.body:
http://i.imgur.com/N42oyZb.png

Quick Shaco sketch, though it seems he's not winning anymore!
How did you draw her body like that?

Sorry I thought I replied yesterday!
Thanks a lot!

what the, I thought I replied!
Thank you very much!

Today in science class we learned that Diana's giant head causes the tides.

Great pic :3 And I voted Shaco, because everybody always does the popular female champs, and not the jester.

Her forehead alone controls the fate of earth-
Haha thanks, I'm surprised at a tie between Shaco and Leona!

I like it - she has a very tranquil expression.  Maybe you could answer a question I have though - is she supposed to be hovering (mostly stationary) or is she moving fast to the left?  
She looks stationary, but the petals(?) going to the right, as well as the eye-flare, give an impression of speed.  Do you know which it is, or is it left up to the viewer to decide?

Thanks!
I was actually thinking of a. Slow descent kinda thing, but I added the eye flare as an afterthought haha, but I think it's cool for people to interpret it their own way too I guess!
Argh, I can't select more than one for the poll! T_T
surprisingly there's a tie between Shaco and Leona!
